text.__SUMMARY__: Arthrostylidium simpliciusculum is a species of Arthrostylidium bamboo in the grass family.
text.Distribution: The species is native to Brazil, Colombia, Ecuador, and Peru.
text.Description: Arthrostylidium simpliciusculum is a tufted perennial with short rhizomes. It grows to between 1 m and 1.2 m in height.
text.External links: Specimens in United States National Herbarium
